name: XoR (itch) (iPomme)
description:
Two players on the same board, each one has one side.

The aim is to get more than the half of the cells of the board.

You can add more than one Fire/Water in one cell.

After each turn, when you dispatched 10 Fire/Water ( stock ), on each cell the maximum between water and fire will win the cell.

Once both played, if one is having more than the half of the cells of the board win!
